Text: Oñ Jiho̩shafat nʼe̩wñ anana kpʼojima e̩kute̩; oñ i le teke fʼalu de̩ kpʼEhab ugbo o̩la o̩ya.
Abu kʼi jʼo̩do̩ pe̩ tak i gwo̩ru nyi Samaria ugbo Ehab. Oñ Ehab fʼame̩wño̩re̩ egini kpʼamokuno̩ kpa ñw u ololo ololo, kpai todu amone̩ ku ma jʼugbo-wñ, oñ i gbo̩ ibe kʼi lebʼo̩ nyi Ramo̩t-gile̩ad.
Ehab, onu Israe̩l, la ka ñwu Jiho̩shafat, onu Juda kakini, Uwe̩ alebʼumi nyi Ramo̩t-gilead? Tak i dohi ñw u kakini, Omi dʼalu kʼuwe̩ de̩, abo-mi la dabe̩ne̩ kʼabo-we̩; omi adʼef ogu le̩ kpʼuwe̩.
Tak Jiho̩shafat ka ñw onu Israe̩l kakini, Agba, e̩ tene o̩la Jihofa eñini ta.
Tak onu Israe̩l kʼamakache̩ wa jo̩, ma chʼone̩ ulo̩ko̩, oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, A nyi Ramo̩t-gilead kʼa jo̩gu, abe̩k u nawe? Taku ma kakini, Mute̩gu alo, oñ O̩jo̩ adʼu tʼonu o̩wo̩.
Ama Jiho̩shafat kakini, I nʼakache̩ Jihofaʼka emi manyʼabo-i, kʼa tene I ugbo owñ n?

Tak onu Israe̩l ka ñwu Jiho̩shafat kakini, E̩ne̩ʼkate kʼa ti Jihofa e̩ne̩ lugbo-wñ bo̩ ta; ulaka-wñ muda ache mi, todu i akache̩ e̩nyo̩ ñwu mi n, chai e̩bie̩ne̩ e̩gba du: owñ che Maikaya, o̩ma Imla. Taku Jiho̩shafat kakini, Onu ki ka abe̩le̩ n.
Tak onu Israe̩l fʼonojiʼka do̩ wa oñ i kakini, E̩ nyʼado̩ Maikaya, o̩ma Imla, wa pio-pio.
Tak onu Israe̩l kpai Jiho̩shafat onu Juda, kʼotogbo-ma nyʼo̩la oñ e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ gugu oj ede-wñ, ma la gugu o̩gbaa ugbo ku ma gudu lʼalaku Samaria; amakache̩ du la jʼo̩gba ma akache̩.
Taku Ze̩de̩kaya o̩ma Ke̩-neana, fʼigba ebije che ñw o̩la-wñ, oñ i kakini, Abu ki Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Uwe̩ anʼe̩wñ-i kʼabo Siria e̩che̩ gbogbo tak e̩ fʼuma lie̩ kpa.
Tak amakache̩ le̩ chaka kache̩ abe̩le̩ ge̩, ma kakini, Mu te̩gu nyi Ramo̩t-gilead, kʼi ra ñw e̩; todu Jihofa adʼu nyʼonu o̩wo̩.
Tak onuche̩ kʼi nyʼado̩ Maikaya ko̩la ñw u kakini, Go, amakache̩ nʼaluʼkate ako̩la e̩nyo̩ ñw onu; todule̩, o̩ko̩ nagba bʼe̩, alu-we̩ ki dab e-ma oka, kʼuwe̩ ki ka e̩nyo̩.
Taku Maikaya kakini, Oji Jihofa, e̩wñ kʼO̩jo̩-mi aka, e-le̩ naka.
Tak e̩gba kʼi lewa ugbo onu, onu ka ñw u kakini, Maikaya, a nyʼakobo̩ Ramo̩t-gilead kʼa jogu? abe̩k u nawe? Tak i kakini, Me̩ te̩gu alo, ki ra ñwu me̩; ma la ako ma nyʼuwe̩ o̩wo̩.
Tak onu ka ñw u kakini, E̩re̩ monu oñ omi akpe̩bo̩ nʼuwe̩ kʼe̩ we eko̩la du tʼochochi le ef odu Jihofa ñwu mi?

Tak i kakini, Omi fʼabo Israe̩l chaka li abu ku ma chʼe̩kpatuka jʼoj uwo uwo dabe̩ne̩ kʼame̩wño̩re̩ egini ku ma ma nʼe̩ne̩ ki adejute̩ ma n; oñ Jihofa kakini, Abo-i nʼodu n; e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-ma ki mudabi tʼunyi-wñ ef ure̩do̩.
Tak onu Israe̩l ka ñwu Jiho̩shafat, Omi ka ñw e̩ ka kʼi akache̩ e̩nyo̩ ugbo mi ni n? chai e̩bie̩ne̩ n?
Oñ Maikaya kakini, Todule̩ ame̩ ki gbʼo̩la Jihofa: u fu Jihofa li abu kʼi gugu oj ede-wñ, oñ o̩wo̩ abo efojale du dago jo̩ o̩wo̩-wñ awo̩to̩ kpʼawohi-wñ.
Taku Jihofa kakini, E̩ne̩ agba Ehab onu Israe̩l ibe kʼi te̩gu nyi Ramo̩t-gilead kʼi wane̩? Tak e̩ne̩ʼka kʼabe̩i, oñ e̩ne̩ omune̩ kʼe-wñ ojoji.
Tak afuʼka dufu wa, oñ i kwodago o̩gba Jihofa, i kakini, Omi agbʼo̩ ibe. Taku Jihofa ka ñw u kakini, E̩wñ e̩ nʼache?
Oñ i kakini, Nadufu, kʼu chʼafu olemi ef alu amakache̩-wñ chaka. Tak i kakini, Uwe̩ agbʼo̩ ibe ochochi, e̩ ñʼafʼu du: dufu alo kʼe̩ che abe̩le̩.
Todule̩ fai, e̩ go, Jihofa mʼafu olemi du tʼef alu amakache̩-we̩-i; Jihofa la fʼo̩la e̩bie̩ne̩ ka ugbo we̩ me̩.
Taku Ze̩de̩kaya, o̩ma Ke̩neana, te̩ me̩rʼu oñ i dʼo̩wo̩ gwo Maikaya iti, oñ i kakini, Onu ugbo oñ Afu Jihofa kwʼugbo mi le kʼi ko̩la ñw e̩?
Taku Maikaya kakini, go, Uwe̩ ali o̩jo̩ kʼuwe̩ anyʼunyi unyi ejefu kʼe̩ dʼo̩la-we̩ maja.
Tak onu Israe̩l kakini, Me̩ mu Maikaya du, ku me̩ mʼu du dabiwa ugbo Emo̩n, agboji ewo-i, kpʼugbo Joash, o̩ma onu;
kʼe̩ kakini, Abu kʼonu ka de̩, kakini, Mʼe̩ne̩-i du tef unyi uga, kʼe̩ la dʼuje̩wñ o̩bata ñw u je̩ kpʼomi o̩bata ñw u ñmo̩, gbogbo tak u mudabiwa ef ure̩do̩.
Taku Maikaya kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼuwe̩ nʼure̩do̩ re dabiwa, maku Jihofa ko̩la lugbo mi n de̩. Tak i kakini, Me̩ gbo̩, ame̩ amone̩-i, o̩chaka me̩.
Abe̩le̩ onu Israe̩l kpai Jiho̩shafat, onu Juda, mute̩gu nyi Ramo̩t-gilead.
Tak onu Israe̩l ka ñwu Jiho̩shafat, kakini, Nakpʼafe̩ lu, tak u nyʼef ogu-i; uwe̩ ki muda kʼotogbo-we̩ nyʼo̩la. Abe̩le̩ onu Israe̩l fʼafe̩-wñ kpalu; oñ ma nyʼef ogu le̩.
Onu Siria la ñwa ñw amagboji abo o̩kogu-wñ tane̩ kakini, Ame̩ ki ja kpʼe̩ne̩ kekele kpʼe̩ne̩ lile du n, chai onu Israe̩l kate me̩ ja kpʼowñ.
Oñ i lewatu e̩gba kʼamagboji abo o̩kogu le̩ fu Jiho̩shafat li, ma kakini, Onu Israe̩l de̩! Oñ ma donyʼu ku ma kobʼo̩; Jiho̩shafat muda kwa, Jihofa la te̩kʼowñ; oñ O̩jo̩ je̩ ñwu ma na bʼo̩ te̩.
Tak i lewatu e̩gba kʼamagboji o̩kogu Li ka kʼi chʼonu Israe̩l de̩ n, ma mudabi bʼeranʼo te̩.

Tak e̩ne̩ʼka fʼoo̩do̩-wñ fa echichi ofo, oñ o̩fa-wñ lʼowe afe̩ ebije afʼonu Israe̩l mu. Tak i ka ñw e̩ne̩ kʼi agwa o̩kogu-wñ kakini, Mʼo̩wo̩-we̩ rida kʼe̩ mʼumi du kwef abogu-i dufu; todu ma fʼumi chʼagbe me̩.
Ogu le̩ ño̩ kwane̩ tule o̩jo̩ le̩, oñ onu Israe̩l fʼo̩la-wñ lo dago ef o̩kogu-wñ le̩ akobʼabo Siria gbogbo nyʼane̩; tak ame̩ru iko kʼolu tunyane̩ i mʼiñmi da.
